lyrics.stanza: O child of the Kingdom in doubt and distress! Why linger—thy Father is waiting to bless? Assured of the mercy and love of thy Lord, Claim each precious promise, take God at His Word!
Take God at His Word, Take God at His Word! Believe every promise, Take God at His Word!
Thy pathway through sorrows and trials may go, Though deep be the waters, they will not o'erflow; Oh, trust in the Savior, His name be adored! Confide in His promise, take God at His Word!
